ygData.subject: Re: New Subject-Jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, Now that I know, I still cant afford it. Wheres a good cash earning spot. I did good in Runnyeye, and now Im in PAW. Is there something im missin here on
ygData.messageBody:
Ok,

Now that I know, I still cant afford it. Wheres a good cash earning
spot. I did good in Runnyeye, and now Im in PAW. Is there something im
missin here on the topic of the the Big Payoff?

-Dyce

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rodney Miller [SMTP:RMiller@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 11:13 AM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] New Subject-Jewelry
>
> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> This has been a hot topic for me since I have been doing a lot of
> purchasing
> the last week. I have even considered working on my smithing skills. The
> going rates for items I can remember are as follows:
>
> Banded Tunic 40pp
> Cape 35pp
> Boots 14 pp (i think)
> Leggings 20 pp
>
> Those are the ones that I remember. This is on the Innoruuk server. Our
> smiths have mostly fixed the prices, so the prices on other servers may be
> lower or higher depending on your market. However, if you check chain
> mail
> prices, it is still cheaper than chain and stronger, so it is a good deal.
>
> Grod
> Innoruuk
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chris Ferriera [mailto:cferriera@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 10:02 AM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] New Subject-Jewelry
>
>
> From: Chris Ferriera <cferriera@...>
>
> Hi, this is off the topic of Jewelry, but what should a reasonable person
> expect to pay for various items of banded armor?
>
> -Dycedarg
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Rodney Miller [SMTP:RMiller@...]
> > Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 11:01 AM
> > To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] New Subject-Jewelry
> >
> > From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
> >
> > Here is a subject we haven't touch on and one I have been wondering
> about.
> > I am level 15 and have pretty much got a full set of banded armor.
> > However,
> > I don't have any earrings, and the rings I wear are just Dervish
> Cutthroat
> > rings which add to your dexterity. What kind of jewelry is everyone
> > wearing
> > and what magic effects do they have? In addition, can you buy this
> > jewelry
> > at the shops or do you have to kill certain characters to get it?
> >
> > Grod
> > 15th Level
